DocsPage.title: SawerSui
DocsPage.subtitle: The First Web3 Donation Platform on Sui Network. Empowering creators with instant, low-fee, and gamified donations.

Introduction.title: Introduction
Introduction.p1: <bold>SawerSui</bold> is a next-generation donation platform designed specifically for streamers and content creators. Built with a bold <bold>Neo-Brutalist</bold> design identity, it bridges the gap between traditional content monetization and the decentralized web.
Introduction.p2: By leveraging the <bold>Sui Network</bold>, SawerSui solves the common pain points of traditional donation platforms ‚Äî high fees, slow settlement times, and lack of transparency ‚Äî while introducing Web3 native features like NFT rewards and decentralized milestones.

Traditional.title: Traditional Platforms
Traditional.li1: <bold>High Fees:</bold> Up to 10-30% cuts from earnings.

SawerSui.title: SawerSui Solution
SawerSui.li3: <bold>Seamless Onboarding:</bold> Login with Google (zkLogin) or Wallet.

Overlays.title: Real-time Overlays
Overlays.desc: Connect seamlessly with OBS or Streamlabs. Alerts appear instantly on-screen when a donation is made, powered by direct blockchain indexing.

GasFree.title: Gas-Free Donations
GasFree.desc: Utilizing Sui's Sponsored Transactions, donors pay <bold>0 gas fees</bold>. You receive 100% of the intended donation amount (minus platform fee).

zkLogin.title: zkLogin (Google)
zkLogin.desc: No private keys needed. Users sign in with their existing Google accounts, making Web3 invisible and accessible to everyone.

Stablecoin.title: Stable Income
Stablecoin.desc: Accept <bold>SUI</bold> or <bold>USDC</bold>. Choose between the native token of the network or a stablecoin to avoid volatility.

TTS.title: Text-to-Speech (TTS)
TTS.desc: Engage your audience with AI-powered voice messages (Gemini TTS) that read donation messages aloud on stream. Includes multiple voice options and audio previews.

Phase1.label: Phase 1
Phase1.title: Foundation (Current)
Phase1.desc: Basic USDC Donation, OBS Alerts, Leaderboards, Google Login, Milestones.

Phase3.label: Phase 3
Phase3.title: Expansion
Phase3.desc: Mobile PWA, Multi-chain support (Bridge), Creator Tools.

GettingStartedPage.title: Getting Started
GettingStartedPage.subtitle: Begin your journey with SawerSui as a Streamer or Supporter.

Step1.title: 1. Login & Connect
Step1.desc: Sign in using <bold>Google (zkLogin)</bold> for a seamless experience or connect your Sui Wallet. No registration fee required.

Step2.title: 2. Complete Profile
Step2.desc: Upon first login, you will be prompted to set your <bold>Username</bold> and <bold>Display Name</bold>. This username will be part of your donation link: `sawersui.vercel.app/username`.

Step3.title: 3. Setup OBS Overlay
Step3.desc: Go to the <bold>Dashboard > Overlay</bold> menu. Copy your unique Overlay URL and add it as a 'Browser Source' in OBS/Streamlabs. <bold>Recommended Size: 500x500px</bold> for best visibility.

Step4.title: 4. Enable TTS
Step4.desc: In <bold>Dashboard > Overlay</bold>, enable 'Text-to-Speech' and set a minimum donation amount. Your audience can now choose a voice and hear their message read aloud!

Step1.title: 1. Find a Creator
Step1.desc: Visit your favorite streamer's profile page (e.g., `sawersui.vercel.app/username`).

Step2.title: 2. Send Support
Step2.desc: You can donate using <bold>SUI</bold> or <bold>USDC</bold>. Login with <bold>Google</bold> or connect your wallet. Enter the amount and a message.

Step3.title: 3. Zero Gas Fees
Step3.desc: Enjoy <bold>0 gas fees</bold> on your donation. The exact amount you send is what the creator receives (minus platform fee).

DonationGuidePage.title: Donation Guide
DonationGuidePage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about receiving and sending support on SawerSui.

Overview.title: How It Works
Overview.p1: SawerSui facilitates direct <bold>Peer-to-Peer (P2P)</bold> donations. When a supporter sends funds, they go directly from their wallet/account to the streamer's wallet‚Äîno intermediaries holding your funds.
Overview.p2: We support both <bold>SUI</bold> and <bold>USDC</bold> on the Sui Network, giving you choice and flexibility.

Wallet.title: Via Sui Wallet
Wallet.desc: Connect any standard Sui wallet (Sui Wallet, Nightly, etc.). ideal for Web3 natives.

Google.title: Via Google (zkLogin)
Google.desc: Donors can login with Google. A temporary wallet is created for the session, making it easy for non-crypto users.

Gas.title: Gas Fees
Gas.desc: We sponsor 100% of gas fees for all donations.

Settlement.title: Settlement
Settlement.desc: Funds arrive in seconds. No holding period.

TTS.title: Text-to-Speech (TTS)
TTS.desc: Creators can enable <bold>AI-powered voices</bold> (Gemini TTS) to read donation messages aloud during the stream.
TTS.p1: You can configure a <bold>Minimum Amount for TTS</bold> to ensure only major donations are read aloud, preventing spam.
TTS.p2: Multiple voice options are available, allowing you to choose the persona that best fits your stream's vibe.

MilestonesGuidePage.title: Milestones
MilestonesGuidePage.subtitle: Set goals, rally your community, and reward them with NFTs.

Overview.title: What are Milestones?
Overview.p1: Milestones are fundraising goals you can set for your stream (e.g., 'New Camera', 'Charity Stream'). They appear as a progress bar on your overlay.
Overview.p2: When a milestone is reached, it triggers a special celebration on your stream!

Step1.title: 1. Create Milestone
Step1.desc: Go to <bold>Dashboard > Milestone</bold>. Click 'Create New' and enter details like Title, Target Amount (USDC), and NFT Reward.

Step2.title: 2. Add to Overlay
Step2.desc: Copy the Milestone Overlay URL and add it as a 'Browser Source' in OBS. You can position it anywhere on your screen.

Step3.title: 3. Promote
Step3.desc: Tell your viewers about the goal! The progress bar updates in real-time as donations come in.

NFT.title: NFT Rewards
NFT.desc: Supporters who contribute to a milestone will receive a unique <bold>SawerSui Milestone NFT</bold> as a proof of support when the goal is met.

Leaderboard.title: Top Supporters
Leaderboard.desc: The milestone overlay highlights the top contributors, giving them extra recognition on your stream.

LeaderboardGuidePage.title: Leaderboard
LeaderboardGuidePage.subtitle: Recognize your top supporters in real-time.

Overview.title: What is the Leaderboard?
Overview.p1: The Leaderboard is a widget that displays your top donors. It encourages competition and gives recognition to your most loyal supporters.
Overview.p2: It updates instantly as new donations come in, keeping your stream engaging.

Step1.title: 1. Access Settings
Step1.desc: Go to <bold>Dashboard > OBS > Leaderboard</bold>. Here you can preview what the overlay will look like.

Step2.title: 2. Customize
Step2.desc: Choose your preferred customize the colors to match your brand.

Step3.title: 3. Add to OBS
Step3.desc: Copy the unique Overlay URL. In OBS, add a new 'Browser Source' and paste the URL. We recommend a vertical layout for the best look.

Realtime.title: Real-time Updates
Realtime.desc: No need to refresh. New donations appear on the list instantly.

Customizable.title: Fully Customizable
Customizable.desc: Change background, text, and rank colors to fit your stream's aesthetic.

Q1.a: SawerSui is a donation platform for streamers on the Sui Network. It allows you to receive support in SUI or USDC with real-time alerts.

Q2.a: Yes. We use the Sui blockchain for all transactions. We don't hold your funds (non-custodial for wallet users). Google logins use zkLogin for secure, non-custodial account creation.

Q1.a: Platform fee is 5%. Gas fees are sponsored (free for you and donors).

Q2.a: If you use a wallet, funds are already in your wallet! If you use Google login, go to Dashboard and click 'Withdraw' to send USDC to any Sui address or exchange.

Q1.q: Do I need a crypto wallet?
Q1.a: No! You can login with your Google account. You will need to top-up SUI or USDC, or ask a friend to send you some.

Q2.a: Sui offers instant speed and low costs, making it perfect for real-time interactions like stream donations.

Q1.a: Settlement is practically instant (<1s finality) on the Sui Network.

Q2.a: None if you use Google Login! But if you prefer self-custody, we support all major Sui wallets (Sui Wallet, Nightly, etc).

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using SawerSui.

Agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
Agreement.p: By accessing or using SawerSui, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.

UserObligations.title: 2. User Obligations
UserObligations.p: You agree not to use the platform for any illegal activities, including but not limited to money laundering, financing terrorism, or harassment. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your Google account and/or private keys.

Payments.title: 3. Payments & Donations
Payments.p1: <bold>Irreversible:</bold> All transactions on the Sui blockchain are final and cannot be reversed.
Payments.p2: <bold>Fees:</bold> A 5% platform fee is automatically deducted from every donation to support development.
Payments.p3: <bold>Taxes:</bold> Users are solely responsible for determining whatever taxes apply to their transactions.

Disclaimer.title: 4. Disclaimer
Disclaimer.p: SawerSui is provided on an 'AS IS' basis. We are not responsible for any losses due to blockchain failures, wallet errors, or third-party services.
